seldonian.RL.environments.gridworld3x3Â¶

3x3 gridworld environment (states: 0-8) with a reward function of 0 everywhere except in r=-1 in cell 7 (bottom middle) and r=1 in cell 8 (bottom right). Actions are 0,1,2,3 for up,down,left,right respectively. An episode starts in cell 0 (top left) and terminates in cell 8 or if timeout occurs.

Classes

Environment()

Seldonian Engine
